text: Chisimu aŵala ŵaakutaŵana namwe chilanga (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), chisimu akutaŵana chilanga ni Allah, nkono wa Allah uli pachanya pa makono gao, sano jwatakase (chilanga chakwecho), nikuti akukasa kwalikonya nsyene, sano jwatakwanilisye yajwataŵene najo Allah, basi (Allah) tachimpa malipilo gamakulungwa nnope
